    • Method Detail

      • setCompilationUnits

        public void setCompilationUnits(Collection<ICompilationUnit> units)
                         throws InterruptedException
        Removes all ICompilationUnit's that are currently in the project and adds the ICompilationUnit's in the specified collection to the project.

        This method will request the scopes for each compilation unit such that the externally visible definitions in each compilation unit can be added to the project's scope.

        Parameters:
        units - Collection of ICompilationUnit's to put in this project.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • collectProblems

        Description copied from class: CompilerProject

      • handleAddedFile

        public boolean handleAddedFile(File addedFile)
        Description copied from class: CompilerProject
        Called by Workspace.fileAdded(org.apache.flex.compiler.filespecs.IFileSpecification) for each project in the workspace. Each subclass of this class must decide when an added file is interesting or should be ignored.
        Specified by:
        handleAddedFile in class CompilerProject
        Parameters:
        addedFile - File that was added.
        Returns:
        true if any new compilation units were created as a result of adding the file, false otherwise.

        Description copied from interface: ICompilerProject
        Test whether the project supports the embedding of assets.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        true if embedding is supported, false otherwise
